Class Heuristic

  • java.lang.Object
    • operators.Heuristic

  • public class Heuristic
extends java.lang.Object
    For heuristics, the 2opt mutation is used, as described at http://www.gcd.org/sengoku/docs/arob98.pdf
    Author:
    btdiem

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void heuristics2opt(Chromosome chromosome, IGraph g)
      Creates childs as heuristics optimalizations of chromosome
      the algorithm is described at described at http://www.gcd.org/sengoku/docs/arob98.pdf and used at http://www.zlote.jabluszko.net/tsp/ The modification is made to apply for design and code in this project
      After muting or crossing, calling heuristic to create new generation
      static void reverse(Chromosome chromosome, int startIndex, int stopIndex)
      Part of heuristics optimalizations of chromosome taken from code at http://www.zlote.jabluszko.net/tsp/

      • heuristics2opt

        public static void heuristics2opt(Chromosome chromosome,
                  IGraph g)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates childs as heuristics optimalizations of chromosome
        the algorithm is described at described at http://www.gcd.org/sengoku/docs/arob98.pdf and used at http://www.zlote.jabluszko.net/tsp/ The modification is made to apply for design and code in this project
        After muting or crossing, calling heuristic to create new generation
        Parameters:
        chromosome - - chromosome to be optimalized
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
